column2: 3 stars for this fine establishment because of the crappy service we received here. Server started off very friendly and interactive
column3: but drinks literally took 25 minutes to arrive. It took us 3 hours to order
column5: and then get our check. It's one thing if it was a party of 6-10 people but this was a party of 3. No reason it should've ever taken this long and they weren't even slam packed busy.
